dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.createDemoDataDesc: Creates a sample agency with routes, stops, and trips to explore the features

agencies.title: Agencies
agencies.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this agency? This action cannot be undone.
agencies.deleteQueued: Agency deletion task queued. Track progress in Task Manager.

validation.invalidUrl: Invalid URL (must start with http:// or https://)

gtfs.agencyNameDesc: Full name of the transit agency (GTFS agency_name)
gtfs.activeDesc: Only active agencies are visible to users
gtfs.agencyIdDesc: Unique identifier for GTFS export (auto-generated from slug if blank)
gtfs.agencyUrlDesc: Agency website URL - required for valid GTFS export
gtfs.agencyTimezoneDesc: Timezone where the agency operates - required for valid GTFS export
gtfs.agencyLangDesc: Primary language used by this agency (ISO 639-1 code)
gtfs.agencyPhoneDesc: Customer service phone number (include country code)
gtfs.agencyFareUrlDesc: URL with fare information (leave blank if same as agency URL)

merge.sourceAgenciesDesc: Select 2 or more agencies to merge
merge.selectAtLeastTwo: Please select at least 2 source agencies
merge.targetAgencyDesc: The agency that will receive the merged feed
merge.newAgencyNameDesc: Name for the new agency that will contain the merged data
merge.enterNewAgencyName: Please enter a name for the new agency
merge.newAgencyDescriptionDesc: Optional description for the new agency
merge.newAgencyDescriptionPlaceholder: Combined transit services for the region
merge.validateFirst: Please validate first and resolve any conflicts
merge.mergeTaskQueued: Merge task queued. Track progress in Task Manager.

feedInfo.title: Feed Info
feedInfo.noInfo: No feed info found. Create one to add metadata.

feeds.title: GTFS Feeds
feeds.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this feed? All associated GTFS data will be removed.
feeds.noFeeds: No feeds found for this agency
feeds.deleteQueued: Feed deletion task queued. Track progress in Task Manager.
feeds.cloneDescription: The cloned feed will be created as inactive. All routes, stops, trips, calendars, and shapes will be copied.
feeds.cloneQueued: Feed clone task queued. Track progress in Task Manager.
feeds.createFromScratchDesc: Create an empty GTFS feed from scratch. You can add routes, stops, trips, and other GTFS data after creation.

routes.title: Routes
routes.description: Manage transit routes and their properties
routes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete route {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.

fields.agencyDesc: The agency that operates this route
fields.gtfsAgencyIdDesc: Reference to agency_id in agency.txt (required if multiple agencies)
fields.routeTypeDesc: The type of transportation used on this route
fields.urlDesc: URL of a web page about this specific route
fields.routeColorDesc: Color that corresponds to this route on maps and signs
fields.textColorDesc: Color for text displayed on the route color background
fields.sortOrderDesc: Order in which routes should be presented to riders (lower values first)
fields.continuousPickupDesc: Indicates whether a rider can board anywhere along the route
fields.continuousDropOffDesc: Indicates whether a rider can alight anywhere along the route
fields.networkIdDesc: Identifies a group of routes for fare network purposes

validation.colorFormat: Color must be a 6-digit hexadecimal value (e.g., FF0000)
validation.urlFormat: URL must start with http:// or https://

stops.title: Stops
stops.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete stop {{name}}?

calendars.title: Calendars
calendars.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the calendar "{{id}}"? This action cannot be undone.

calendarDates.title: Calendar Dates
calendarDates.noExceptions: No exceptions defined for this calendar
calendarDates.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the exception for {{date}}?
calendarDates.invalidDateFormat: Date must be in YYYYMMDD format

stopTimes.title: Stop Times
stopTimes.description: Manage stop times and schedules for trips
stopTimes.selectTrip: Select a trip to view stop times
stopTimes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this stop time?
stopTimes.timeFormat: Time must be in HH:MM:SS format

fareAttributes.title: Fare Attributes
fareAttributes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete fare "{{id}}"?

fields.fareIdEditDesc: Changing the fare ID will automatically update all related fare rules
fields.paymentMethodDesc: When the fare must be paid
fields.transferDurationDesc: Length of time transfers are valid (seconds)

fareRules.title: Fare Rules
fareRules.description: Define how fares apply to routes and zones
fareRules.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this fare rule for "{{id}}"?
fareRules.routeDescription: Leave empty to apply to all routes
fareRules.containsDescription: Zone that must be passed through
fareRules.ruleExplanation: This rule will apply the selected fare when a trip matches the specified route and/or zone criteria.
fareRules.info: Fare rules define how fare attributes apply to specific routes or zone-based itineraries. Each rule links a fare to routes and/or origin/destination zones.
fareRules.formHelp: Define when a fare applies. Leave route/zone fields empty to match all.

fields.fareIdDesc: The fare attribute this rule applies to
fields.routeIdDesc: Route this fare applies to (leave empty for all routes)
fields.containsIdDesc: Zone the trip must pass through

shapeEditor.minPointsError: Shape must have at least 2 points
shapeEditor.shapeCreated: Shape "{{id}}" created. Add more points to define the route.
shapeEditor.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete shape "{{id}}"? This cannot be undone.
shapeEditor.selectShapeToEdit: Select a shape from the dropdown to edit

tasks.subtitle: Monitor and manage asynchronous tasks
tasks.noTasksDescription: All asynchronous tasks will appear here

merge.targetAgencyHelp: Select the agency to merge into

shapes.noValidPoints: Shape has no valid coordinate points

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your team settings and integrations

settings.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of your team
settings.customImageUrl: Or use a custom image URL
settings.customImageHint: Provide a URL to an image (PNG, JPG, etc.) for a custom badge
settings.webhooksDescription: Configure webhooks to receive notifications about events

import.title: Import GTFS
import.description: Import GTFS data from ZIP files into your feeds
import.dropZone: Drop GTFS ZIP file here or click to select

export.title: Export GTFS
export.description: Export your GTFS data to a ZIP file
export.pageDescription: Export your GTFS data to a ZIP file. The system will validate the export before download.
export.selectFeedFirst: Please select a feed to export
export.selectFeedDesc: Choose the agency and feed you want to export. The system will generate a GTFS ZIP file and validate it.
export.dataSummaryDesc: This export will include the following data from the selected agency:
export.exportStarted: Your GTFS export will download shortly
export.validationDesc: The system is generating and validating your GTFS export using the MobilityData GTFS Validator.
export.hasErrors: The exported file has validation errors. You can still download it, but it may not work correctly with some GTFS consumers.
export.downloadDesc: Your GTFS export is ready. Download the ZIP file and the validation report.
export.downloadComplete: Download started! Check your downloads folder.

customFields.title: Custom Fields
customFields.keyExists: A field with this name already exists

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.validationError: Please check your input and try again.

feedSources.title: External Feed Sources
feedSources.description: Configure external GTFS feeds to automatically monitor and import
feedSources.name: Name
feedSources.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this feed source?

validationSettings.title: Validation Settings
validationSettings.description: Configure which GTFS validations to run for each agency. Preferences are automatically saved per agency.
validationSettings.selectFeedFirst: Please select a feed to validate
validationSettings.validationInfo: Validation will run using the enabled rules configured in Settings. Results show errors, warnings, and informational messages.

rules.routeAgencyDesc: Check that each route references a valid GTFS agency
rules.routeDuplicatesDesc: Ensure no two routes have the same route_id
rules.routeMandatoryDesc: Check that required GTFS fields are filled
rules.shapeDistTraveledDesc: Check that shape_dist_traveled is filled where expected
rules.shapeDistAccuracyDesc: Verify shape_dist_traveled makes sense with coordinates
rules.shapeMandatoryDesc: Check that required GTFS shape fields are filled
rules.calendarMandatoryDesc: Check that required calendar fields are filled
rules.calendarDateMandatoryDesc: Check that required calendar_dates fields are filled
rules.fareAttributeMandatoryDesc: Check that required fare_attributes fields are filled
rules.feedInfoMandatoryDesc: Check that required feed_info fields are filled
rules.stopDuplicatesDesc: Ensure no two stops have the same stop_id
rules.stopMandatoryDesc: Check that required GTFS stop fields are filled
rules.tripServiceDesc: Check that trip service_id exists in calendar or calendar_dates
rules.tripDuplicatesDesc: Ensure no two trips have the same trip_id
rules.tripShapeDesc: Check that trip shape_id references a valid shape
rules.tripMandatoryDesc: Check that required GTFS trip fields are filled
rules.stopTimeTripDesc: Check that stop_time trip_id references a valid trip
rules.stopTimeStopDesc: Check that stop_time stop_id references a valid stop
rules.stopTimeSequenceDesc: Ensure stop_sequence is increasing within each trip
rules.stopTimeMandatoryDesc: Check that required GTFS stop_time fields are filled

validationSettings.feedIsValid: Feed is valid according to GTFS specification
validationSettings.openInNewTab: Opens detailed HTML report in a new tab
